statements: SELECT * FROM air_quality_data
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant_type='CO'
SELECT location_id, pollutant_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -80
SELECT MAX(pollutant_level) AS max_pollutant_level FROM air_quality_data
SELECT location_id, pollutant_type, timestamp FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant_type = 'PM2.5' ORDER BY longitude ASC
SELECT MAX(pollutant_level) AS max_pollutant_level, MIN(pollutant_level) AS min_pollutant_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT DISTINCT(location_id) FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant_type IN ('NO2', 'O3', 'CO')
SELECT location_id, timestamp FROM air_quality_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50
SELECT location_id, AVG(pollution_level) AS average_pollution_level FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY location_id
SELECT * FROM pollution_hotspots WHERE pollution_level_threshold < 20
SELECT location, MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution_level FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(pollution_level) > 50;
SELECT location_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY data_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data JOIN pollution_hotspots ON air_quality_data.location_id = pollution_hotspots.hotspot_id WHERE pollution_level > pollution_level_threshold;
SELECT location_id, MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level, MIN(pollution_level) AS min_pollution_level FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT location, pollutant, concentration FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant = 'PM2.5';
SELECT * FROM pollution_hotspots ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT location, concentration FROM air_quality_data WHERE concentration > 50;
SELECT AVG(concentration) AS avg_concentration, MAX(concentration) AS max_concentration FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE concentration > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, pollutant, concentration FROM air_quality_data WHERE location = 'City A' AND pollutant = 'CO2';
SELECT location, severity FROM pollution_hotspots WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT strategy, impact FROM environmental_health WHERE impact = 'Positive';
SELECT MAX(concentration) AS max_concentration, MIN(concentration) AS min_concentration FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMeasurements;
SELECT id, location_id, timestamp FROM PollutionHotspots ORDER BY severity_level ASC;
SELECT location_id, pollutant_name, pollutant_level FROM AirQualityMeasurements WHERE pollutant_level > 50;
SELECT id, strategy_name, description FROM EnvironmentalHealthStrategy WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT area_name, city_name, district_name FROM UrbanAreas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMeasurements WHERE pollutant_level > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, location_id, hotspot_description FROM PollutionHotspots WHERE severity_level = 'High' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, strategy_name, implementation_date FROM EnvironmentalHealthStrategy WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY implementation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, area_name, city_name, district_name FROM UrbanAreas WHERE city_name = 'New York' ORDER BY area_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, area_name, city_name, district_name FROM UrbanAreas WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY district_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, location, pollutant_type FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE pollutant_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM PollutionHotspots ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalHealthStrategies WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT area_name, population FROM UrbanAreas WHERE population < 50000;
SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE pollutant_level > 100;
SELECT location, pollutant_type, timestamp FROM AirQualitySensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(pollutant_level) AS avg_pollutant_level, location FROM AirQualitySensorData GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM PollutionHotspots WHERE description LIKE '%high pollution%';
SELECT area_name, population FROM UrbanAreas WHERE population > 500000 ORDER BY population DESC;
